title: Guardian icon given to me but not?
body: First off, I was notified by Riot on screen that I has received my icon. Client goes dark, chest appears, "You received a gift from Riot" etc. However a day later it's still not actually in my icon list for me to use...

replies.body: I believe that award toast was for the Worlds Pick'em Icon, and not the star guardian.  As long as you took the quiz while signed in to the site, you'll get the icon.  If you've waited over a week since taking the quiz, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can figure out what happened.  Hang tight until then and it should come!
Ah yes I think you're right. Thanks for the quick response!
